item.description:
*** Just a quick not to let you all know that I won't be able to get to the Meetup until a little after 5:30 pm.  Table is all set in the lounge. I know you can all hold your own until I get there!

 

Appetizer 1/2 Price List!

rhode island calamari 5.50
thai chicken lettuce wraps 4.50
buffalo-caribbean chicken tenders 4.50
pan-seared crab cakes 5.50
golden-fried coconut shrimp 5.50
vegetable spring rolls 3.99
house-made guacamole 3.50
hummus with papadum chips 3.50
forno baked chicken quesadilla 4.75
seared ahi tuna wontons 5.75

Pizzas…appetizer sized 3.50
all pizzas are offered appetizer sized:  two favorites are: Bacon Blue – blue cheese, country bacon, caramelized onions, arugula, balsamic reduction and Santa Fe – pulled chicken, grilled fresh corn, red onions, poblano peppers, mozzarella, chipotle sour cream.

Note:  Half Price Appetizers are served till 6 p.m.

Available in the bar/lounge area only.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the bar/lounge wearing my Girls Just Wanna Have Fun Pin!

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: 1/2 Price Appetizer & Cocktails
